instructions: Open Google Photos. Tap the overflow icon (the one with three lines at the upper-left of your screen). Tap Settings . Tap Back up & sync . Google Photos home screen Google Photos menu Google Photos settings Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Tap Back up device folders . Toggle the folders you want to be backed up. Google Photos back up and sync settings Google Photos device folders Source: Joe Maring / Android Central

Open Google Photos . Tap the overflow icon (the one with three lines at the upper-left of your screen). Tap Settings . Tap Back up & sync . Google Photos home screen Google Photos menu Google Photos settings Source: Joe Maring / Android Central Tap Upload Size . Tap the image quality you want. Google Photos back up and sync settings Google Photos image quality settings Source: Joe Maring / Android Central
